members.name: PermissionStatus.state
members.description: Returns the state of a requested permission; one of 'granted', 'denied', or 'prompt'.

members.name: PermissionStatus.status
members.description: Returns the state of a requested permission; one of 'granted', 'denied', or 'prompt'. Later versions of the specification replace this with PermissionStatus.state.

members.name: PermissionStatus.onchange
members.description: An event called whenever PermissionStatus.status changes.
